title: MathML fractions and roots
summary: In this lesson, we've seen how to build fractions and roots using the <mfrac>, <msqrt> and <mroot> elements. We noticed some special feature of these elements, namely the fraction and radical symbol. We've seen how to use the linethickness attribute to draw fractions without bars. In the next article, we will continue with basic math notations and consider scripts.
